title: Travels in the United States of America, in the years 1806& 1807, and 1809, 1810, & 1811;
author: Melish, John
snippet: One of the beautiful Lomond hills rises immediately to the south of Falkland, and reaches an elevation of about 1200 feet.

title: Scotland Picturesque and Traditional. A pilgrimage with staff and knapsack
author: Todd, George Eyre.
snippet: Loch Etive, Loch AAve, Loch Fyne, Loch Long, Lochjailss^i^lf Lomond, Loch Katrine, and Loch Voil—all sparkle in ashining half-circle round the breast of that great centralmountain, and there is not a more interesting journey in the Highlandsthan to folloAv the road Avhich links the splendours of the pendant chain.
